verses.verse: And <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H7927>Shechem<s%>: for to <S%H7927>Shechem<s%> were all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to make him <S%H4427>king<s%>.

And it came to pass, when <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat<s%>, who was in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, whither he had <S%H1272>fled<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H8085>heard<s%> it, that <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.
And they <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> him. So <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H1696>spake<s%> to <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Thy <S%H1>father<s%> made our <S%H5923>yoke<s%> <S%H7185>grievous<s%>: now therefore <S%H7043>ease<s%> thou somewhat the <S%H7186>grievous<s%> <S%H5656>servitude<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%>, and his <S%H3515>heavy<s%> <S%H5923>yoke<s%> that he <S%H5414>put<s%> upon us, and we will <S%H5647>serve<s%> thee.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Come <S%H7725>again<s%> unto me after <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>. And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3212>departed<s%>.

¶ And <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> took <S%H3289>counsel<s%> with the <S%H2205>old<s%> men that had <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> while he yet <S%H2416>lived<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H349>What<s%> counsel <S%H3289>give<s%> ye me to <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H1697>answer<s%> to this <S%H5971>people<s%>?

And they <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto him, <S%H559>saying<s%>, If thou be <S%H2896>kind<s%> to this <S%H5971>people<s%>, and <S%H7521>please<s%> them, and <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> to them, they will be thy <S%H5650>servants<s%> for <S%H3117>ever<s%>.

But he <S%H5800>forsook<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> which the old <S%H2205>men<s%> <S%H3289>gave<s%> him, and took <S%H3289>counsel<s%> with the young <S%H3206>men<s%> that were brought <S%H1431>up<s%> with him, that <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, What <S%H3289>advice<s%> give ye that we may <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H1697>answer<s%> to this <S%H5971>people<s%>, which have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to me, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H7043>Ease<s%> somewhat the <S%H5923>yoke<s%> that thy <S%H1>father<s%> did <S%H5414>put<s%> upon us?

And the young <S%H3206>men<s%> that were brought <S%H1431>up<s%> with him <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto him, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thus shalt thou <S%H559>answer<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto thee, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Thy <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3513>made<s%> our <S%H5923>yoke<s%> <S%H3513>heavy<s%>, but make thou it somewhat <S%H7043>lighter<s%> for us; thus shalt thou <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, My <S%H6995>little<s%> finger shall be <S%H5666>thicker<s%> than my <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H4975>loins<s%>.

For <S%H6258>whereas<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H6006>put<s%> a <S%H3515>heavy<s%> <S%H5923>yoke<s%> upon you, I will put <S%H3254>more<s%> to your <S%H5923>yoke<s%>: my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3256>chastised<s%> you with <S%H7752>whips<s%>, but I will chastise you with <S%H6137>scorpions<s%>.

So <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>, as the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1696>bade<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Come <S%H7725>again<s%> to me on the <S%H7992>third<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%>.
And the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> them <S%H7186>roughly<s%>; and <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H5800>forsook<s%> the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of the old <S%H2205>men<s%>,

And <S%H1696>answered<s%> them after the <S%H6098>advice<s%> of the young <S%H3206>men<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, My <S%H1>father<s%> made your <S%H5923>yoke<s%> <S%H3513>heavy<s%>, but I will <S%H3254>add<s%> thereto: my <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3256>chastised<s%> you with <S%H7752>whips<s%>, but I will chastise you with <S%H6137>scorpions<s%>.

So the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> not unto the <S%H5971>people<s%>: for the <S%H5252>cause<s%> was of <S%H430>God<s%>, that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> might <S%H6965>perform<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%>, which he <S%H1696>spake<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H281>Ahijah<s%> the <S%H7888>Shilonite<s%> to <S%H3379>Jeroboam<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5028>Nebat<s%>.

¶ And when all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H4428>king<s%> would not <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto them, the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7725>answered<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, What <S%H2506>portion<s%> have we in <S%H1732>David<s%>? and we have none <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> in the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%>: every <S%H376>man<s%> to your <S%H168>tents<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: and now, <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H7200>see<s%> to thine own <S%H1004>house<s%>. So all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to their <S%H168>tents<s%>.
But as for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H4427>reigned<s%> over them.

Then <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H1913>Hadoram<s%> that was over the <S%H4522>tribute<s%>; and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7275>stoned<s%> him with <S%H68>stones<s%>, that he <S%H4191>died<s%>. But <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7346>Rehoboam<s%> made <S%H553>speed<s%> to get him <S%H5927>up<s%> to his <S%H4818>chariot<s%>, to <S%H5127>flee<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.
And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6586>rebelled<s%> against the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.
